category.name: Dispatcher
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ETS_update_state_delay
preference.preference_description: Specifies the delay time in seconds after which a dispatcher request object can be updated.When there are multiple dispatcher clients in a Dispatcher installation, multiple dispatcher clients can update the state of the same dispatcher request object. The delay time makes sure that only one dispatcher client updates the dispatcher request object.If you set a very high delay time, the performance of the dispatcher request may be affected. Siemens PLM Software recommends that the delay time should not be greater than 5 seconds. Valid Values: Must be a single positive integer.
